overview: Roy joined InnoCrowding in 2009 after having worked with GRP for nearly 8 years as a two-time entrepreneur. Most recently Roy was Vice President at Salesforce.com (NASDAQ: CRM) following its acquisition of Koral,where Roy was Founder and CEO. Prior to Koral, Roy was Founder and CEO of BuildOnline, the largest independent global content collaboration company focused on the engineering and construction sectors, which was acquired by SWORD Group (PARIS: SWP). Earlier in his career, Roy spent nearly ten years working for Accenture in Europe, Japan and the U.S. Roy received a BA in Economics from the University of California, San Diego, and an MBA from the University of Chicago.
